quote: I so wish life also had the option of undo making it easier to deal with things you erred. I would have gone back in time to undo every mistake of mine, for which I have paid a very heavy price.
quote_letters: I SO WISH LIFE ALSO HAD THE OPTION OF UNDO MAKING IT EASIER TO DEAL WITH THINGS YOU ERRED I WOULD HAVE GONE BACK IN TIME TO UNDO EVERY MISTAKE OF MINE FOR WHICH I HAVE PAID A VERY HEAVY PRICE
